entry.title: WIND WARNING , Inukjuak
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:40 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -4.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Inukjuak Airport 01:45 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -4.2°C
Pressure: 98.9 kPa
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 93 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -5.2°C
Wind: ENE 50 km/h gust 65 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Wind northeast 60 km/h gusting to 90. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow in the morning. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
